types1:Item.types1:Name: Marketo_Lead_Database_API_Jenkins_Demo
types1:Item.types1:Tags: Activities,Bulk CustomObjects,Bulk Export Activities,Bulk Export Leads,Bulk Leads,Campaigns,Companies,Custom Objects,Leads,Named Account Lists,Named Accounts,Opportunities,Sales Persons,Static Lists,Usage

businessConnector.displayName: Marketo Lead Database API Jenkins Demo
businessConnector.name: Marketo_Lead_Database_API_Jenkins_Demo
businessConnector.tags: Activities,Bulk CustomObjects,Bulk Export Activities,Bulk Export Leads,Bulk Leads,Campaigns,Companies,Custom Objects,Leads,Named Account Lists,Named Accounts,Opportunities,Sales Persons,Static Lists,Usage

action.label: deleteSalesPersonUsingPOST
action.name: deleteSalesPersonUsingPOST
action.description: Delete SalesPersons. Deletes a list of salesperson records from the target instance. Input records should have only one member, based on the value of 'dedupeBy'. Required Permissions: Read-Write Sales Person

action.label: describeUsingGET_5
action.name: describeUsingGET_5
action.description: Describe SalesPersons. Returns metadata about salespersons and the fields available for interaction via the API. Required Permissions: Read-Only Sales Person, Read-Write Sales Person

action.label: getExportLeadsUsingGET
action.name: getExportLeadsUsingGET
action.description: Get Export Lead Jobs. Returns a list of export jobs that were created in the past 7 days. Required Permissions: Read-Only Lead

parameter.description: Comma separated list of statuses to filter on.
parameter.label: status
parameter.name: status

parameter.description: The batch size to return. The max and default value is 300.
parameter.label: batchSize
parameter.name: batchSize

parameter.description: A token will be returned by this endpoint if the result set is greater than the batch size and can be passed in a subsequent call through this parameter. See Paging Tokens for more info.
parameter.label: nextPageToken
parameter.name: nextPageToken

action.label: getActivitiesPagingTokenUsingGET
action.name: getActivitiesPagingTokenUsingGET
action.description: Get Paging Token. Returns a paging token for use in retrieving activities and data value changes. Required Permissions: Read-Only Activity, Read-Write Activity

parameter.description: Earliest datetime to retrieve activities from
parameter.label: sinceDatetime
parameter.name: sinceDatetime

action.label: getExportActivitiesFileUsingGET
action.name: getExportActivitiesFileUsingGET
action.description:
Get Export Activity File. Returns the file content of an export job. The export job must be in "Completed" state. Use Get Export Lead Job Status endpoint to retrieve status of export job. Required Permissions: Read-Only Activity

The file format is specified by calling the Create Export Activity Job endpoint. The following is an example of the default file format ("CSV"). Note that the "attributes" field is formatted as JSON.

marketoGUID,leadId,activityDate,activityTypeId,campaignId,primaryAttributeValueId,primaryAttributeValue, attributes
122323,6,2013-09-26T06:56:35+0000,12,11,6,Owyliphys Iledil,[{"name":"Source Type","value":"Web page visit"}]

parameter.description: Id of export batch job.
parameter.label: exportId
parameter.name: exportId

parameter.description: To support partial retrieval of extracted data, the HTTP header "Range" of type "bytes" may be specified. See RFC 2616 "Range Retrieval Requests" for more information. If the header is not set, the entire contents will be returned.
parameter.label: Range
parameter.name: Range

action.label: approveCustomActivityTypeUsingPOST
action.name: approveCustomActivityTypeUsingPOST
action.description: Approve Custom Activity Type. Approves the current draft of the type, and makes it the live version. This will delete the current live version of the type. Required Permissions: Read-Write Activity Metadata

parameter.description: API Name of the activity type
parameter.label: apiName
parameter.name: apiName

action.label: deleteNamedAccountListsUsingPOST
action.name: deleteNamedAccountListsUsingPOST
action.description: Delete Named Account Lists. Delete named account lists by dedupe fields, or by id field. Required Permissions: Read-Write Named Account List

action.label: getLast7DaysUsageUsingGET
action.name: getLast7DaysUsageUsingGET
action.description: Get Weekly Usage. Returns a list of API users and the number of calls they have consumed in the past 7 days. Required Permissions: None

action.label: deleteLeadsUsingPOST
action.name: deleteLeadsUsingPOST
action.description: Delete Leads. Delete a list of leads from the destination instance. Required Permissions: Read-Write Lead

action.label: syncOpportunitiesUsingPOST
action.name: syncOpportunitiesUsingPOST
action.description: Sync Opportunities. Allows inserting, updating, or upserting of opportunity records into the target instance. Required Permissions: Read-Write Named Opportunity

action.label: getOpportunitiesUsingGET
action.name: getOpportunitiesUsingGET
action.description: Get Opportunities. Returns a list of opportunities based on a filter and set of values. Required Permissions: Read-Only Opportunity, Read-Write Named Opportunity

parameter.description: Opportunities field to filter on
parameter.label: filterType
parameter.name: filterType

parameter.description: Comma-separated list of values to match against
parameter.label: filterValues
parameter.name: filterValues

parameter.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in the response
parameter.label: fields
parameter.name: fields

parameter.description: Maximum number of records to return in the response. Max and default is 300
parameter.label: batchSize
parameter.name: batchSize

parameter.description: Paging token returned from a previous response
parameter.label: nextPageToken
parameter.name: nextPageToken

action.label: removeNamedAccountListMembersUsingPOST
action.name: removeNamedAccountListMembersUsingPOST
action.description: Remove Named Account List Members. Removes named account members from a named account list. Required Permissions: Read-Write Named Account

parameter.description: Id of target named account list
parameter.label: id
parameter.name: id

action.label: getLeadActivitiesUsingGET
action.name: getLeadActivitiesUsingGET
action.description: Get Lead Activities. Returns a list of activities from after a datetime given by the nextPageToken parameter. Also allows for filtering by lead static list membership, or by a list of up to 30 lead ids. Required Permissions: Read-Only Activity, Read-Write Activity

parameter.description: Token representation of a datetime returned by the Get Paging Token endpoint. This endpoint will return activities after this datetime
parameter.label: nextPageToken
parameter.name: nextPageToken

parameter.description: Comma-separated list of activity type ids. These can be retrieved with the Get Activity Types API.
parameter.label: activityTypeIds
parameter.name: activityTypeIds

parameter.description: Id of the primary asset for an activity. This is based on the primary asset id of a given activity type. Should only be used when a single activity type is set
parameter.label: assetIds
parameter.name: assetIds

parameter.description: Id of a static list. If set, will only return activities of members of this static list.
parameter.label: listId
parameter.name: listId

parameter.description: Comma-separated list of lead ids. If set, will only return activities of the leads with these ids. Allows up to 30 entries.
parameter.label: leadIds
parameter.name: leadIds

parameter.description: Maximum number of records to return. Maximum and default is 300.
parameter.label: batchSize
parameter.name: batchSize

action.label: deleteNamedAccountsUsingPOST
action.name: deleteNamedAccountsUsingPOST
action.description: Delete NamedAccounts. Deletes a list of namedaccount records from the target instance. Input records should have only one member, based on the value of 'dedupeBy'. Required Permissions: Read-Write Named Account

action.label: getDailyErrorsUsingGET
action.name: getDailyErrorsUsingGET
action.description: Get Daily Errors. Retrieves a list of API users and a count of each error type they have encountered in the current day. Required Permissions: None

action.label: createCustomActivityTypeUsingPOST
action.name: createCustomActivityTypeUsingPOST
action.description: Create Custom Activity Type. Creates a new custom activity type draft in the target instance. Required Permissions: Read-Write Activity Metadata

action.label: getImportCustomObjectStatusUsingGET
action.name: getImportCustomObjectStatusUsingGET
action.description: Get Import Custom Object Status. Returns the status of an import batch job. Required Permissions: Read-Write Custom Object

parameter.description: API Name of the custom object for the import batch job.
parameter.label: apiName
parameter.name: apiName

parameter.description: Id of the import batch job.
parameter.label: id
parameter.name: id

action.label: describeCustomActivityTypeUsingGET
action.name: describeCustomActivityTypeUsingGET
action.description: Describe Custom Activity Type. Returns metadata for a specific custom activity type. Required Permissions: Read-Only Activity Metadata, Read-Write Activity Metadata

parameter.description: API Name of the activity type
parameter.label: apiName
parameter.name: apiName

action.label: getCampaignByIdUsingGET
action.name: getCampaignByIdUsingGET
action.description: Get Campaign By Id. Returns the record of a campaign by its id. Required Permissions: Read-Only Campaigns, Read-Write Campaigns

action.label: getDeletedLeadsUsingGET
action.name: getDeletedLeadsUsingGET
action.description: Get Deleted Leads. Returns a list of leads deleted after a given datetime. Deletions greater than 14 days old may be pruned. Required Permissions: Read-Only Activity, Read-Write Activity

parameter.description: Token representation of a datetime returned by the Get Paging Token endpoint. This endpoint will return activities after this datetime
parameter.label: nextPageToken
parameter.name: nextPageToken

parameter.description: Maximum number of records to return. Maximum and default is 300.
parameter.label: batchSize
parameter.name: batchSize

action.label: addLeadsToListUsingPOST
action.name: addLeadsToListUsingPOST
action.description: Add to List. Adds a given set of person records to a target static list. There is a limit of 300 lead ids per request. Required Permissions: Read-Write Lead

parameter.description: Id of target list
parameter.label: listId
parameter.name: listId

parameter.description: Optional JSON request body for submitting leads
parameter.label: listOperationRequest
parameter.name: listOperationRequest

parameter.description: Comma-separated list of lead ids to add to the list
parameter.label: id
parameter.name: id

action.label: getLeadsByListIdUsingGET_1
action.name: getLeadsByListIdUsingGET_1
action.description: Get Leads By List Id. Retrieves person records which are members of the given static list. Required Permissions: Read-Only Lead, Read-Write Lead

parameter.description: Id of the static list to retrieve records from
parameter.label: listId
parameter.name: listId

parameter.description: Comma-separated list of lead fields to return for each record. If unset will return email, updatedAt, createdAt, lastName, firstName and id
parameter.label: fields
parameter.name: fields

parameter.description: The batch size to return. The max and default value is 300.
parameter.label: batchSize
parameter.name: batchSize

parameter.description: A token will be returned by this endpoint if the result set is greater than the batch size and can be passed in a subsequent call through this parameter. See Paging Tokens for more info.
parameter.label: nextPageToken
parameter.name: nextPageToken

action.label: removeLeadsFromListUsingDELETE
action.name: removeLeadsFromListUsingDELETE
action.description: Remove from List. Removes a given set of person records from a target static list. Required Permissions: Read-Write Lead

parameter.description: Id of static list to remove leads from
parameter.label: listId
parameter.name: listId

action.label: getImportCustomObjectWarningsUsingGET
action.name: getImportCustomObjectWarningsUsingGET
action.description: Get Import Custom Object Warnings. Returns the list of warnings for the import batch job. Required Permissions: Read-Write Custom Object

parameter.description: API Name of the custom object for the import batch job.
parameter.label: apiName
parameter.name: apiName

parameter.description: Id of the import batch job.
parameter.label: id
parameter.name: id

action.label: associateLeadUsingPOST
action.name: associateLeadUsingPOST
action.description: Associate Lead. Associates a known Marketo lead record to a munchkin cookie and its associated web acitvity history. Required Permissions: Read-Write Lead

parameter.description: The id of the lead to associate
parameter.label: leadId
parameter.name: leadId

parameter.description: The cookie value to associate
parameter.label: cookie
parameter.name: cookie

action.label: deleteOpportunityRolesUsingPOST
action.name: deleteOpportunityRolesUsingPOST
action.description: Delete Opportunity Roles. Deletes a list of opportunities from the target instance. Required Permissions: Read-Write Named Opportunity

action.label: getCampaignsUsingGET
action.name: getCampaignsUsingGET
action.description: Get Campaigns. Returns a list of campaign records. Required Permissions: Read-Only Campaigns, Read-Write Campaigns

parameter.description: Comma-separated list of campaign ids to return records for
parameter.label: id
parameter.name: id

parameter.description: Comma-separated list of names to filter on
parameter.label: name
parameter.name: name

parameter.description: Comma-separated list of program names to filter on. If set, will filter to only campaigns which are children of the designated programs.
parameter.label: programName
parameter.name: programName

parameter.description: Comma-separated list of workspace names to filter on. If set, will only return campaigns in the given workspaces.
parameter.label: workspaceName
parameter.name: workspaceName

parameter.description: Maximum number of records to return. Maximum and default is 300.
parameter.label: batchSize
parameter.name: batchSize

parameter.description: A token will be returned by this endpoint if the result set is greater than the batch size and can be passed in a subsequent call through this parameter. See Paging Tokens for more info.
parameter.label: nextPageToken
parameter.name: nextPageToken

parameter.description: Set to true to return active Campaigns which have a Campaign is Requested trigger and source is Web Service API
parameter.label: isTriggerable
parameter.name: isTriggerable

action.label: discardDraftofCustomActivityTypeUsingPOST
action.name: discardDraftofCustomActivityTypeUsingPOST
action.description: Discard Custom Activity Type Draft. Discards the current draft of the custom activity type. Required Permissions: Read-Write Activity Metadata

parameter.description: API Name of the activity type
parameter.label: apiName
parameter.name: apiName

action.label: getImportLeadFailuresUsingGET
action.name: getImportLeadFailuresUsingGET
action.description: Get Import Lead Failures. Returns the list of failures for the import batch job. Required Permissions: Read-Write Lead

parameter.description: Id of the import batch job.
parameter.label: batchId
parameter.name: batchId

action.label: describeUsingGET_1
action.name: describeUsingGET_1
action.description: Describe Custom Objects. Returns metadata regarding a given custom object. Required Permissions: Read-Only Custom Object, Read-Write Custom Object

action.label: createExportLeadsUsingPOST
action.name: createExportLeadsUsingPOST
action.description: Create Export Lead Job. Create export job for search criteria defined via "filter" parameter. Request returns the "exportId" which is passed as a parameter in subsequent calls to Bulk Export Leads endpoints. Use Enqueue Export Lead Job endpoint to queue the export job for processing. Use Get Export Lead Job Status endpoint to retrieve status of export job. Required Permissions: Read-Only Lead

parameter.description:
exportLeadRequest

ColumnHeaderNames: A JSON object containing key-value pairs of field and column header names.

Example:
"columnHeaderNames":{
"firstName":"First Name",
"lastName":"Last Name",
"email":"Email Address"
}
parameter.label: exportLeadRequest
parameter.name: exportLeadRequest

action.label: updatePartitionsUsingPOST
action.name: updatePartitionsUsingPOST
action.description: Update Lead Partition. Updates the lead partition for a list of leads. Required Permissions: Read-Write Lead

action.label: getLeadPartitionsUsingGET
action.name: getLeadPartitionsUsingGET
action.description: Get Lead Partitions. Returns a list of available partitions in the target instance. Required Permissions: Read-Only Lead, Read-Write Lead

action.label: getLeadsByListIdUsingGET
action.name: getLeadsByListIdUsingGET
action.description: Get Leads By List Id. Retrieves person records which are members of the given static list. Required Permissions: Read-Only Lead, Read-Write Lead

parameter.description: Id of the static list to retrieve records from
parameter.label: listId
parameter.name: listId

parameter.description: Comma-separated list of lead fields to return for each record. If unset will return email, updatedAt, createdAt, lastName, firstName and id
parameter.label: fields
parameter.name: fields

parameter.description: The batch size to return. The max and default value is 300.
parameter.label: batchSize
parameter.name: batchSize

parameter.description: A token will be returned by this endpoint if the result set is greater than the batch size and can be passed in a subsequent call through this parameter. See Paging Tokens for more info.
parameter.label: nextPageToken
parameter.name: nextPageToken

action.label: addCustomActivityUsingPOST
action.name: addCustomActivityUsingPOST
action.description: Add Custom Activities. Allows insertion of custom activities associated to given lead records. Requires provisioning of custom activity types to utilize. Required Permissions: Read-Write Activity

action.label: cancelExportActivitiesUsingPOST
action.name: cancelExportActivitiesUsingPOST
action.description: Cancel Export Activity Job. Cancel export job. Required Permissions: Read-Only Activity

parameter.description: Id of export batch job.
parameter.label: exportId
parameter.name: exportId

action.label: getImportLeadWarningsUsingGET
action.name: getImportLeadWarningsUsingGET
action.description: Get Import Lead Warnings. Returns the list of warnings for the import batch job. Required Permissions: Read-Write Lead

parameter.description: Id of the import batch job.
parameter.label: batchId
parameter.name: batchId

action.label: updateCustomActivityTypeAttributesUsingPOST
action.name: updateCustomActivityTypeAttributesUsingPOST
action.description: Update Custom Activity Type Attributes. Updates the attributes of the custom activity type draft. The apiName of each attribute is the primary key for the update. Required Permissions: Read-Write Activity Metadata

parameter.description: API Name of the activity type
parameter.label: apiName
parameter.name: apiName

action.label: describeUsingGET_6
action.name: describeUsingGET_6
action.description: Describe Lead2. Returns list of searchable fields on lead objects in the target instance. Required Permissions: Read-Only Lead, Read-Write Lead

action.label: enqueueExportActivitiesUsingPOST
action.name: enqueueExportActivitiesUsingPOST
action.description: Enqueue Export Activity Job. Enqueue export job. This will place export job in queue, and will start the job when computing resources become available. The export job must be in "Created" state. Use Get Export Activity Job Status endpoint to retrieve status of export job. Required Permissions: Read-Only Activity

parameter.description: Id of export batch job.
parameter.label: exportId
parameter.name: exportId

action.label: describeUsingGET_3
action.name: describeUsingGET_3
action.description: Describe NamedAccounts. Returns metadata about namedaccounts and the fields available for interaction via the API. Required Permissions: Read-Only Named Account, Read-Write Named Account

action.label: deleteCustomObjectsUsingPOST
action.name: deleteCustomObjectsUsingPOST
action.description: Delete Custom Objects. Deletes a given set of custom object records. Required Permissions: Read-Write Custom Object

action.label: deleteOpportunitiesUsingPOST
action.name: deleteOpportunitiesUsingPOST
action.description: Delete Opportunities. Deletes a list of opportunity records from the target instance. Input records should only have one member, based on the value of 'dedupeBy'. Required Permissions: Read-Write Named Opportunity

action.label: scheduleCampaignUsingPOST
action.name: scheduleCampaignUsingPOST
action.description: Schedule Campaign. Remotely schedules a batch campaign to run at a given time. My tokens local to the campaign's parent program can be overridden for the run to customize content. When using the "cloneToProgramName" parameter described below, this endpoint is limited to 20 calls per day. Required Permissions: Execute Campaign

parameter.description: Id of the batch campaign to schedule.
parameter.label: campaignId
parameter.name: campaignId

action.label: areLeadsMemberOfListUsingGET
action.name: areLeadsMemberOfListUsingGET
action.description: Member of List. Checks if leads are members of a given static list. Required Permissions: Read-Write Lead

parameter.description: Id of the static list to check against
parameter.label: listId
parameter.name: listId

parameter.description: Optional JSON request body
parameter.label: listOperationRequest
parameter.name: listOperationRequest

parameter.description: Comma-separated list of lead ids to check
parameter.label: id
parameter.name: id

action.label: triggerCampaignUsingPOST
action.name: triggerCampaignUsingPOST
action.description: Request Campaign. Passes a set of leads to a trigger campaign to run through the campaign's flow. The designated campaign must have a Campaign is Requested: Web Service API trigger, and must be active. My tokens local to the campaign's parent program can be overridden for the run to customize content. A maximum of 100 leads are allowed per call. Required Permissions: Execute Campaign

parameter.description: The id of the campaign to trigger
parameter.label: campaignId
parameter.name: campaignId

action.label: enqueueExportLeadsUsingPOST
action.name: enqueueExportLeadsUsingPOST
action.description: Enqueue Export Lead Job. Enqueue export job. This will place export job in queue, and will start the job when computing resources become available. The export job must be in "Created" state. Use Get Export Lead Job Status endpoint to retrieve status of export job. Required Permissions: Read-Only Lead

parameter.description: Id of export batch job.
parameter.label: exportId
parameter.name: exportId

action.label: describeUsingGET_4
action.name: describeUsingGET_4
action.description: Describe Opportunity. Returns object and field metadata for Opportunity type records in the target instance. Required Permissions: Read-Only Opportunity, Read-Write Named Opportunity

action.label: describeUsingGET
action.name: describeUsingGET
action.description: Describe Companies. Returns metadata about companies and the fields available for interaction via the API. Required Permissions: Read-Only Company, Read-Write Company

action.description: Get Leads by Program Id. Retrieves a list of leads which are members of the designated program. Required Permissions: Read-Only Lead, Read-Write Lead

parameter.description: The id of the program to retrieve from
parameter.label: programId
parameter.name: programId

parameter.description: A comma-separated list of fields to be returned for each record
parameter.label: fields
parameter.name: fields

parameter.description: The batch size to return. The max and default value is 300.
parameter.label: batchSize
parameter.name: batchSize

parameter.description: A token will be returned by this endpoint if the result set is greater than the batch size and can be passed in a subsequent call through this parameter. See Paging Tokens for more info.

action.label: getExportActivitiesStatusUsingGET
action.name: getExportActivitiesStatusUsingGET
action.description: Get Export Activity Job Status. Returns status of an export job. Job status is available for 30 days after Completed or Failed status was reached. Required Permissions: Read-Only Activity

parameter.description: Id of export batch job.
parameter.label: exportId
parameter.name: exportId

action.label: createCustomActivityTypeAttributesUsingPOST
action.name: createCustomActivityTypeAttributesUsingPOST
action.description: Create Custom Activity Type Attributes. Adds activity attributes to the target type. These are added to the draft version of the type. Required Permissions: Read-Write Activity Metadata

parameter.description: API Name of the activity type
parameter.label: apiName
parameter.name: apiName

action.label: deleteCustomActivityTypeAttributesUsingPOST
action.name: deleteCustomActivityTypeAttributesUsingPOST
action.description: Delete Custom Activity Type Attributes. Deletes the target attributes from the custom activity type draft. The apiName of each attribute is the primary key for the update. Required Permissions: Read-Write Activity Metadata

parameter.description: API Name of the activity type
parameter.label: apiName
parameter.name: apiName

action.label: getExportLeadsFileUsingGET
action.name: getExportLeadsFileUsingGET
action.description:
Get Export Lead File. Returns the file content of an export job. The export job must be in "Completed" state. Use Get Export Lead Job Status endpoint to retrieve status of export job. Required Permissions: Read-Only Lead

The file format is specified by calling the Create Export Lead Job endpoint. The following is an example of the default file format ("CSV").

firstName,lastName,email
Ivanka,Trump,ivanka@invankatrump.com

parameter.description: Id of export batch job.
parameter.label: exportId
parameter.name: exportId

parameter.description: To support partial retrieval of extracted data, the HTTP header "Range" of type "bytes" may be specified. See RFC 2616 "Range Retrieval Requests" for more information. If the header is not set, the entire contents will be returned.
parameter.label: Range
parameter.name: Range

action.label: getCustomActivityTypeUsingGET
action.name: getCustomActivityTypeUsingGET
action.description: Get Custom Activity Types. Returns metadata regarding custom activities provisioned in the target instance. Required Permissions: Read-Only Activity Metadata, Read-Write Activity Metadata

parameter.description: Id of the named account list

parameter.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in the response

action.label: getDailyUsageUsingGET
action.name: getDailyUsageUsingGET
action.description: Get Daily Usage. Returns a list of API users and the number of calls they have consumed for the day. Required Permissions: None

action.label: importCustomObjectUsingPOST
action.name: importCustomObjectUsingPOST
action.description: Import Custom Objects. Imports a file containing data records into the target instance. Required Permissions: Read-Write Custom Object

parameter.description: API Name of the custom object for the import batch job.
parameter.label: apiName
parameter.name: apiName

parameter.description: Import file format.
parameter.label: format
parameter.name: format

parameter.description: File containing the data records to import.
parameter.label: file
parameter.name: file

action.label: getImportLeadStatusUsingGET
action.name: getImportLeadStatusUsingGET
action.description: Get Import Lead Status. Returns the status of an import batch job. Required Permissions: Read-Write Lead

parameter.description: Id of the import batch job.
parameter.label: batchId
parameter.name: batchId

action.label: syncCustomObjectsUsingPOST
action.name: syncCustomObjectsUsingPOST
action.description: Sync Custom Objects. Inserts, updates, or upserts custom object records to the target instance. Required Permissions: Read-Write Custom Object

action.label: getCustomObjectsUsingGET
action.name: getCustomObjectsUsingGET
action.description: Get Custom Objects. Retrieves a list of custom objects records based on filter and set of values. There are two unique types of requests for this endpoint: one is executed normally using a GET with URL parameters, the other is by passing a JSON object in the body of a POST and specifying _method=GET in the querystring. The latter is used when dedupeFields attribute has more than one field, which is known as a "compound key". Required Permissions: Read-Only Custom Object, Read-Write Custom Object

parameter.description: Name of custom object type to retrieve records for
parameter.label: customObjectName
parameter.name: customObjectName

parameter.description:
Optional JSON request for retrieving custom objects with compound keys. Example:
{
"filterType":"dedupeFields",
"fields":[
"marketoGuid",
"Bedrooms",
"yearBuilt"
],
"input":[
{
"mlsNum":"1962352",
"houseOwnerId":"42645756"
},
{
"mlsNum":"3962352",
"houseOwnerId":"62645756"
}
]
}
parameter.label: customObjectLookupRequest
parameter.name: customObjectLookupRequest

parameter.description: Field to filter on. Searchable fields can be retrieved with Describe Custom Object
parameter.label: filterType
parameter.name: filterType

parameter.description: Comma-separated list of field values to match against.
parameter.label: filterValues
parameter.name: filterValues

parameter.description: Comma-separated list of fields to return for each record. If unset marketoGuid, dedupeFields, updatedAt, createdAt will be returned
parameter.label: fields
parameter.name: fields

parameter.description: The batch size to return. The max and default value is 300.
parameter.label: batchSize
parameter.name: batchSize

parameter.description: A token will be returned by this endpoint if the result set is greater than the batch size and can be passed in a subsequent call through this parameter. See Paging Tokens for more info.
parameter.label: nextPageToken
parameter.name: nextPageToken

action.label: syncNamedAccountsUsingPOST
action.name: syncNamedAccountsUsingPOST
action.description: Sync NamedAccounts. Allows inserts, updates, or upserts of namedaccounts to the target instance. Required Permissions: Read-Write Named Account

action.label: getNamedAccountsUsingGET
action.name: getNamedAccountsUsingGET
action.description: Get NamedAccounts. Retrieves namedaccount records from the destination instance based on the submitted filter. Required Permissions: Read-Only Named Account, Read-Write Named Account

parameter.description: NamedAccounts field to filter on
parameter.label: filterType
parameter.name: filterType

parameter.description: The namedaccount field to filter on. Searchable fields can be retrieved with the Describe SalesPerson call.
parameter.label: filterValues
parameter.name: filterValues

parameter.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in the response
parameter.label: fields
parameter.name: fields

parameter.description: The batch size to return. The max and default value is 300.
parameter.label: batchSize
parameter.name: batchSize

parameter.description: A token will be returned by this endpoint if the result set is greater than the batch size and can be passed in a subsequent call through this parameter. See Paging Tokens for more info.
parameter.label: nextPageToken
parameter.name: nextPageToken

action.label: getAllActivityTypesUsingGET
action.name: getAllActivityTypesUsingGET
action.description: Get Activity Types. Returns a list of available activity types in the target instance, along with associated metadata of each type. Required Permissions: Read-Only Activity, Read-Write Activity

action.label: deleteCustomActivityTypeUsingPOST
action.name: deleteCustomActivityTypeUsingPOST
action.description: Delete Custom Activity Type. Deletes the target custom activity type. The type must first be removed from use by any assets, such as triggers or filters. Required Permissions: Read-Write Activity Metadata

parameter.description: API Name of the activity type
parameter.label: apiName
parameter.name: apiName

action.label: getLast7DaysErrorsUsingGET
action.name: getLast7DaysErrorsUsingGET
action.description: Get Weekly Errors. Returns a list of API users and a count of each error type they have encountered in the past 7 days. Required Permissions: None

action.label: syncLeadUsingPOST
action.name: syncLeadUsingPOST
action.description: Sync Leads. Syncs a list of leads to the target instance. Required Permissions: Read-Write Lead

action.label: getLeadsByFilterUsingGET
action.name: getLeadsByFilterUsingGET
action.description: Get Leads by Filter Type. Returns a list of up to 300 leads based on a list of values in a particular field. Required Permissions: Read-Only Lead, Read-Write Lead

parameter.description:
The lead field to filter on. Any custom field (string, email, or integer types only), and any of the following fields are supported: cookies, email, facebookId, id, leadPartitionId, linkedInId, sfdcAccountId, sfdcContactId, sfdcLeadId, sfdcLeadOwnerId, sfdcOpptyId, twitterId.

A comprehensive list of fields can be obtained via the Describe Lead2 endpoint.
parameter.label: filterType
parameter.name: filterType

parameter.description: A comma-separated list of values to filter on in the specified fields.
parameter.label: filterValues
parameter.name: filterValues

parameter.description: A comma-separated list of lead fields to return for each record
parameter.label: fields
parameter.name: fields

parameter.description: The batch size to return. The max and default value is 300.
parameter.label: batchSize
parameter.name: batchSize

parameter.description: A token will be returned by this endpoint if the result set is greater than the batch size and can be passed in a subsequent call through this parameter. See Paging Tokens for more info.
parameter.label: nextPageToken
parameter.name: nextPageToken

action.label: syncNamedAccountListsUsingPOST
action.name: syncNamedAccountListsUsingPOST
action.description: Sync Named Account Lists. Creates and/or updates named account list records. Required Permissions: Read-Write Named Account List

action.label: getNamedAccountListsUsingGET
action.name: getNamedAccountListsUsingGET
action.description: Get Named Account Lists. Retrieves a list of named account list records based on the filter type and values given. Required Permissions: Read-Only Named Account List, Read-Write Named Account List

parameter.description: The named account list field to filter on ("dedupeFields" or "idFields").
parameter.label: filterType
parameter.name: filterType

parameter.description: Comma-separated list of values to match against
parameter.label: filterValues
parameter.name: filterValues

parameter.description: The batch size to return. The max and default value is 300.
parameter.label: batchSize
parameter.name: batchSize

parameter.description: A token will be returned by this endpoint if the result set is greater than the batch size and can be passed in a subsequent call through this parameter. See Paging Tokens for more info.
parameter.label: nextPageToken
parameter.name: nextPageToken

action.label: getListsUsingGET
action.name: getListsUsingGET
action.description: Get Lists. Returns a set of static list records based on given filter parameters. Required Permissions: Read-Only Lead, Read-Write Lead

parameter.description: Comma-separated list of static list ids to return
parameter.label: id
parameter.name: id

parameter.description: Comma-separated list of static list names to return
parameter.label: name
parameter.name: name

parameter.description: Comma-separated list of program names. If set will return all static lists that are children of the given programs
parameter.label: programName
parameter.name: programName

parameter.description: Comma-separated list of workspace names. If set will return all static lists that are children of the given workspaces
parameter.label: workspaceName
parameter.name: workspaceName

parameter.description: The batch size to return. The max and default value is 300.
parameter.label: batchSize
parameter.name: batchSize

parameter.description: A token will be returned by this endpoint if the result set is greater than the batch size and can be passed in a subsequent call through this parameter. See Paging Tokens for more info.
parameter.label: nextPageToken
parameter.name: nextPageToken

action.label: getExportActivitiesUsingGET
action.name: getExportActivitiesUsingGET
action.description: Get Export Activity Jobs. Returns a list of export jobs that were created in the past 7 days. Required Permissions: Read-Only Activity

parameter.description: Comma separated list of statuses to filter on.
parameter.label: status
parameter.name: status

parameter.description: The batch size to return. The max and default value is 300.
parameter.label: batchSize
parameter.name: batchSize

parameter.description: A token will be returned by this endpoint if the result set is greater than the batch size and can be passed in a subsequent call through this parameter. See Paging Tokens for more info.
parameter.label: nextPageToken
parameter.name: nextPageToken

action.label: getListByIdUsingGET
action.name: getListByIdUsingGET
action.description: Get List by Id. Returns a list record by its id. Required Permissions: Read-Only Lead, Read-Write Lead

parameter.description: Id of the static list to retrieve records from
parameter.label: listId
parameter.name: listId

action.label: updateCustomActivityTypeUsingPOST
action.name: updateCustomActivityTypeUsingPOST
action.description: Update Custom Activity Type. Updates the target custom activity type. All changes are applied to the draft version of the type. Required Permissions: Read-Write Activity Metadata

parameter.description: API Name of the activity type
parameter.label: apiName
parameter.name: apiName

action.label: deleteCompaniesUsingPOST
action.name: deleteCompaniesUsingPOST
action.description: Delete Companies. Deletes the included list of company records from the destination instance. Required Permissions: Read-Write Company

action.label: createExportActivitiesUsingPOST
action.name: createExportActivitiesUsingPOST
action.description: Create Export Activity Job. Create export job for search criteria defined via "filter" parameter. Request returns the "exportId" which is passed as a parameter in subsequent calls to Bulk Export Activities endpoints. Use Enqueue Export Activity Job endpoint to queue the export job for processing. Use Get Export Activity Job Status endpoint to retrieve status of export job. Required Permissions: Read-Only Activity

parameter.description:
exportActivityRequest

ColumnHeaderNames: A JSON object containing key-value pairs of field and column header names.

Example:
"columnHeaderNames":{
"primaryAttributeValueId":"Attribute ID",
"primaryAttributeValue":"Attribute Value",
"attributes":"Secondary Attributes"
}
parameter.label: exportActivityRequest
parameter.name: exportActivityRequest

action.label: getExportLeadsStatusUsingGET
action.name: getExportLeadsStatusUsingGET
action.description: Get Export Lead Job Status. Returns status of an export job. Job status is available for 30 days after Completed or Failed status was reached. Required Permissions: Read-Only Lead

parameter.description: Id of export batch job.
parameter.label: exportId
parameter.name: exportId

action.label: mergeLeadsUsingPOST
action.name: mergeLeadsUsingPOST
action.description: Merge Leads. Merges two or more known lead records into a single lead record. Required Permissions: Read-Write Lead

parameter.description: The id of the winning lead record
parameter.label: leadId
parameter.name: leadId

parameter.description: The id of the losing record
parameter.label: leadId_loss
parameter.name: leadId_loss

parameter.description: A comma-separated list of ids of losing records
parameter.label: leadIds
parameter.name: leadIds

parameter.description: If set, will attempt to merge the designated records in a natively-synched CRM. Only valid for instances with are natively synched to SFDC.
parameter.label: mergeInCRM
parameter.name: mergeInCRM

action.label: getLeadByIdUsingGET
action.name: getLeadByIdUsingGET
action.description: Get Lead by Id. Retrieves a single lead record through it's Marketo id. Required Permissions: Read-Only Lead, Read-Write Lead

parameter.description: The Marketo lead id
parameter.label: leadId
parameter.name: leadId

parameter.description: Comma separated list of field names. If omitted, the following default fields will be returned: email, updatedAt, createdAt, lastName, firstName, and id.
parameter.label: fields
parameter.name: fields

action.label: changeLeadProgramStatusUsingPOST
action.name: changeLeadProgramStatusUsingPOST
action.description: Change Lead Program Status. Changes the program status of a list of leads in a target program. Only existing members of the program may have their status changed with this API. Required Permissions: Read-Write Lead

action.label: syncOpportunityRolesUsingPOST
action.name: syncOpportunityRolesUsingPOST
action.description: Sync Opportunity Roles. Allows inserts, updates and upserts of Opportunity Role records in the target instance. Required Permissions: Read-Write Named Opportunity

action.label: getOpportunityRolesUsingGET
action.name: getOpportunityRolesUsingGET
action.description: Get Opportunity Roles. Returns a list of opportunity roles based on a filter and set of values. Required Permissions: Read-Only Opportunity, Read-Write Named Opportunity

parameter.description: Optional JSON request for retrieving opportunity roles with compound keys
parameter.label: customObjectLookupRequest
parameter.name: customObjectLookupRequest

parameter.description: The role field to filter on. Searchable fields can be retrieved with the Describe Opportunity call.
parameter.label: filterType
parameter.name: filterType

parameter.description: Comma-separated list of field values to return records for
parameter.label: filterValues
parameter.name: filterValues

parameter.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in the response
parameter.label: fields
parameter.name: fields

parameter.description: Maximum number of records to return in the response. Max and default is 300
parameter.label: batchSize
parameter.name: batchSize

parameter.description: Paging token returned from a previous response
parameter.label: nextPageToken
parameter.name: nextPageToken

action.label: importLeadUsingPOST
action.name: importLeadUsingPOST
action.description: Import Leads. Imports a file containing data records into the target instance. Required Permissions: Read-Write Lead

parameter.description: Import file format.
parameter.label: format
parameter.name: format

parameter.description:
Field to use for deduplication. Custom fields (string, email, integer), and the following field types are supported: id, cookies, email, twitterId, facebookId, linkedInId, sfdcAccountId, sfdcContactId, sfdcLeadId, sfdcLeadOwnerId, sfdcOpptyId. Default is email.
Note: You can use id for update only operations.
parameter.label: lookupField
parameter.name: lookupField

parameter.description: Name of the lead partition to import to.
parameter.label: partitionName
parameter.name: partitionName

parameter.description: Id of the static list to import into.
parameter.label: listId
parameter.name: listId

parameter.description: File containing the data records to import.
parameter.label: file
parameter.name: file

action.label: describeUsingGET_2
action.name: describeUsingGET_2
action.description: Describe Lead. Returns metadata about lead objects in the target instance, including a list of all fields available for interaction via the APIs. Required Permissions: Read-Only Lead, Read-Write Lead

action.label: getLeadChangesUsingGET
action.name: getLeadChangesUsingGET
action.description: Get Lead Changes. Returns a list of Data Value Changes and New Lead activities after a given datetime. Required Permissions: Read-Only Activity, Read-Write Activity

parameter.description: Token representation of a datetime returned by the Get Paging Token endpoint. This endpoint will return activities after this datetime
parameter.label: nextPageToken
parameter.name: nextPageToken

parameter.description: Comma-separated list of field names to return changes for. Field names can be retrieved with the Describe Lead API.
parameter.label: fields
parameter.name: fields

parameter.description: Id of a static list. If set, will only return activities of members of this static list.
parameter.label: listId
parameter.name: listId

parameter.description: Comma-separated list of lead ids. If set, will only return activities of the leads with these ids. Allows up to 30 entries.
parameter.label: leadIds
parameter.name: leadIds

parameter.description: Maximum number of records to return. Maximum and default is 300.
parameter.label: batchSize
parameter.name: batchSize

action.label: pushToMarketoUsingPOST
action.name: pushToMarketoUsingPOST
action.description: Push Lead to Marketo. Upserts a lead, and generates a Push Lead to Marketo activity. Required Permissions: Read-Write Lead

action.label: syncCompaniesUsingPOST
action.name: syncCompaniesUsingPOST
action.description: Sync Companies. Allows inserting, updating, or upserting of company records into Marketo. Required Permissions: Read-Write Company

action.label: getCompaniesUsingGET
action.name: getCompaniesUsingGET
action.description: Get Companies. Retrieves company records from the destination instance based on the submitted filter. Required Permissions: Read-Only Company, Read-Write Company

parameter.description: The company field to filter on. Searchable fields can be retrieved with the Describe Company call.
parameter.label: filterType
parameter.name: filterType

parameter.description: Comma-separated list of values to match against
parameter.label: filterValues
parameter.name: filterValues

parameter.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in the response
parameter.label: fields
parameter.name: fields

parameter.description: The batch size to return. The max and default value is 300.
parameter.label: batchSize
parameter.name: batchSize

parameter.description: A token will be returned by this endpoint if the result set is greater than the batch size and can be passed in a subsequent call through this parameter. See Paging Tokens for more info.
parameter.label: nextPageToken
parameter.name: nextPageToken

action.label: listCustomObjectsUsingGET
action.name: listCustomObjectsUsingGET
action.description: List Custom Objects. Returns a list of Custom Object types available in the target instance, along with id and deduplication information for each type. Required Permissions: Read-Only Custom Object, Read-Write Custom Object

parameter.description: Comma-separated list of names to filter types on
parameter.label: names
parameter.name: names

action.label: syncSalesPersonsUsingPOST
action.name: syncSalesPersonsUsingPOST
action.description: Sync SalesPersons. Allows inserts, updates, or upserts of salespersons to the target instance. Required Permissions: Read-Write Sales Person

action.label: getSalesPersonUsingGET
action.name: getSalesPersonUsingGET
action.description: Get SalesPersons. Retrieves salesperson records from the destination instance based on the submitted filter. Required Permissions: Read-Only Sales Person, Read-Write Sales Person

parameter.description: The sales person field to filter on. Searchable fields can be retrieved with the Describe Sales Person call.
parameter.label: filterType
parameter.name: filterType

parameter.description: Comma seperated list of search values.
parameter.label: filterValues
parameter.name: filterValues

parameter.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in the response
parameter.label: fields
parameter.name: fields

parameter.description: The batch size to return. The max and default value is 300.
parameter.label: batchSize
parameter.name: batchSize

parameter.description: A token will be returned by this endpoint if the result set is greater than the batch size and can be passed in a subsequent call through this parameter. See Paging Tokens for more info.
parameter.label: nextPageToken
parameter.name: nextPageToken

action.label: describeOpportunityRoleUsingGET
action.name: describeOpportunityRoleUsingGET
action.description: Describe Opportunity Role. Returns object and field metadata for Opportunity Roles in the target instance. Required Permissions: Read-Only Opportunity, Read-Write Named Opportunity

processObject.name: LeadInputData
processObject.description: Lead record containing only lead id

processObject.name: InputLead
processObject.description: Lead record containing only lead id

processObject.name: LeadChangeField
processObject.description: Activity record containing information on a data value change

processObject.name: Lead
processObject.description: Lead record. Always contains id, but may have any number of other fields, depending on the fields available in the target instance.

processObject.name: ScheduleCampaignRequest
processObject.description: Record describe how to schedule the campaign

processObject.name: ExportResponse
processObject.description: Response containing export job status information

processObject.name: Company
processObject.description: Company record. May include any additional fields listed in the corresponding describe method

processObject.name: Campaign
processObject.description: Record of a Marketo Smart Campaign

types1:Item.types1:DisplayName: Marketo Lead Database API Jenkins Demo
